info.title: Resoluciones CRUD Version 2
info.description: Nueva versi√≥n de API CRUD para el sistema de Resoluciones

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order corresponding to each sortby field, if single value, apply to all sortby fields. e.g. desc,asc ...

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the size of result set. Must be an integer

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Start position of result set. Must be an integer

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id you want to update

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id you want to delete
